sources.title: 1942 Das Grosse Spiel
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich über des Mannes Lieblingssport,dem Fussball, Das große Spiel von 1942

metadata.Plot: A player on a soccer team, where everyone matches together just perfectly, has fallen out of a championship tournament due to illness; which leads to a big problem: who would be the perfect man to replace him? Werner Fehling appea...
metadata.Writer: Toni Huppertz, Richard Kirn, Robert A. Stemmle
metadata.Actors: René Deltgen, Gustav Knuth, Heinz Engelmann
